alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bannock, northeastern Power and southwestern Bingham Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of American Falls to near Pocatello. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls Reservoir, Chubbuck, Aberdeen, Fort Hall Buffalo Lodge, Fort Hall Eagle Lodge, Fort Hall Lincoln Creek Lodge, Fort Hall Townsite, Springfield, Rockford, Pingree, Pocatello Airport, Fort Hall Putnam Lodge and Sterling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain
